Russia: Russo-Persian War (1722–1723): The Persian shah signed a peace treaty ceding the cities of Derbent and Baku and the provinces of Shirvan, Guilan, Mazandaran and Astrabad to the Russian Empire.
France: Louis XV Became the new King of France.
Chile: After 30 years of peace, the War of Arauco resumes with a Mapuche uprising.
Belgium: Shares in the Ostend Company issued on Antwerp Exchange.
